headline: DAEDAL 20501
specstable:
Manufacturer Daedal
Model 20501
Stage Diameter 5.00 in (127 mm)

Maximum Payload 25.00 lb (11.34 kg)

Other Information Table height is 3.5" with vacuum chuck added
Gear ratio: 180 to 1

Accuracy: 10 arc/sec

Max torque: 15 oz/in
Vexta stepper motor with manual thumb knob, nema 23
Home switch
